name: Therapoptic
description:
Therapoptic is a game jam project, under the theme satisfaction. It is a puzzle game where you have to get laser beams to the end, popping as many bubbles as possible.

Credits

  • John Skelly - Production & Music/Sound
  • Harry Miller - Programming
  • Zak - Programming
  • Annie Canty - Art
  • Shania Doughty - Art
  • Sina Kanuga - Art & Design
  • Nena Atanasova - Art
  • Dylan Hart - Music/Sound & Design
  • Jaydon Hart - Design
  • Liam Deering - Design
  • Shania Doughty - Design
